meanings.definition: Relating to or concerned with alchemy.
meanings.sent1: The alchemical process involves mysterious transformations.
meanings.sent2: Her alchemical skills were highly sought after in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The alchemical potion turned the frog into a prince!
meanings.sent4: His words had an alchemical effect on her mood, brightening her day.
meanings.sent5: The alchemical symbols glowed with an otherworldly light.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the transformation of something common into something precious.
meanings.sent1: The alchemical recipe turned simple ingredients into gold.
meanings.sent2: The alchemical process was a closely guarded secret.
meanings.sent3: The alchemical touch of the artist transformed the plain canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an alchemical quality, making everyone around her feel special.
meanings.sent5: The alchemical charm bracelet seemed to bring good luck to its wearer.

meanings.definition: Having the properties or powers of alchemy.
meanings.sent1: The alchemical book contained ancient wisdom and magical spells.
meanings.sent2: The alchemical nature of the potion made it highly sought after.
meanings.sent3: The alchemical wand shimmered with hidden powers.
meanings.sent4: His alchemical abilities seemed to defy the laws of nature.
meanings.sent5: The alchemical elixir promised to grant eternal youth.
